mapper.select: select recipient_id recipientId, user_id userId, recipient_name recipientName, recipient_nickname recipientNickname, recipient_postcode recipientPostcode, recipient_addr1 recipientAddr1, recipient_addr2 recipientAddr2, recipient_addr3 recipientAddr3, recipient_phone recipientPhone from yetsul_recipient where user_id=#{value} and recipient_status='Y' and show_or_not='Y'

select recipient_id recipientId, user_id userId, recipient_name recipientName, recipient_nickname recipientNickname, recipient_postcode recipientPostcode, recipient_addr1 recipientAddr1, recipient_addr2 recipientAddr2, recipient_addr3 recipientAddr3, recipient_phone recipientPhone, recipient_status recipientStatus from yetsul_recipient where recipient_id=#{value}

select r.recipient_id recipientId, r.user_id userId, recipient_name recipientName, recipient_nickname recipientNickname, recipient_postcode recipientPostcode, recipient_addr1 recipientAddr1, recipient_addr2 recipientAddr2, recipient_addr3 recipientAddr3, recipient_phone recipientPhone, recipient_status recipientStatus, order_id lastOrderId, order_date lastOrderDate from yetsul_recipient r left outer join ( select o1.recipient_id, o1.orderid order_id, o2.order_date order_date from(select recipient_id,max(order_id) orderid from yetsul_order group by recipient_id) o1 inner join yetsul_order o2 on o1.orderid=o2.order_id ) o on o.recipient_id=r.recipient_id where user_id=#{value} and show_or_not='Y' order by order_id desc nulls last,created_at

select user_name recipientName, user_id userId, user_postcode recipientPostcode, user_addr1 recipientAddr1, user_addr2 recipientAddr2, user_addr3 recipientAddr3, user_phone recipientPhone, 'Y' recipientStatus from yetsul_user where user_id=#{id}
